attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i am fed up of labour and you (PM). the petrol price may have gone down abit but this country is still mess up and now your talking about tax cut.
why don't you just step down and let someone more better take the lead

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/DoUsALLaFavour/
Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
